original_text: Then I will again give you honest judges, as you had a long time ago. I will also give you wise officers, as you had before. After that, you will be called “The Righteous City” and “The Faithful City”.’
korean_text: 내가 네 재판관들을 처음과 같이, 네 모사들을 본래와 같이 회복할 것이라 그리한 후에야 네가 의의 성읍이라, 신실한 고을이라 불리리라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Then I will again give you honest judges
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 다시 너희에게 정직한 재판관들을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: as you had a long time ago
I will also give you wise officers
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또한 너희에게 지혜로운 관리들을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: you will be called "The Righteous City"
